lead_paragraph: Savannah Guthrie, co-anchor of NBC's "Today" show, said on Tuesday she is pregnant and will not travel to Brazil to cover the Olympics in August for the network due to concerns over the Zika virus, which has been linked to the birth defect microcephaly.

headline.print_headline: Pregnant NBC 'Today' Anchor Guthrie Skipping Olympics Due to Zika
headline.main: Pregnant NBC 'Today' Anchor Guthrie Skipping Olympics Due to Zika
